山稼ぎ: (やまかせぎ) - making a living in the mountains
山積: (さんせき) - lying in piles; form into piles; forming a (huge) pile
山積み: (やまづみ) - huge mound; heap; pile
山窩: (サンカ) - group of mountain nomads (in Japan); group of mountain people; the Sanka
山立: (やまだち) - bandit/brigand; hunter; ancient hunting communities in Tohoku
山立ち: (やまだち) - bandit/brigand; hunter; ancient hunting communities in Tohoku
山笑う: (やまわらう) - mountain in springtime when all of the tree buds open at the same time (usu. in haiku); laughing mountain
山篭り: (やまごもり) - secluding oneself in the mountains/undertaking ascetic practices at a mountain temple; retreat/off-site meeting
山籠り: (やまごもり) - secluding oneself in the mountains/undertaking ascetic practices at a mountain temple; retreat/off-site meeting
山粧う: (やまよそおう) - mountain covered in autumn colours at the end of autumn
山系: (さんけい) - mountain range; mountain system
山紫陽花: (ヤマアジサイ) - tea-of-heaven (Hydrangea macrophylla subsp. serrata); mountain hydrangea
山縞馬: (ヤマシマウマ) - mountain zebra (Equus zebra)
山繭: (ヤママユ) - Japanese oak silkmoth (Antheraea yamamai)
山繭蛾: (ヤママユガ) - Japanese oak silkmoth (Antheraea yamamai)
山肌: (やまはだ) - mountain's surface; bare surface of a mountain
山背: (やませ) - cold wind descending from the mountains; cold Pacific wind (in the Tohoku region in summer)
山背風: (やませかぜ) - cold wind descending from the mountains
山膚: (やまはだ) - mountain's surface; bare surface of a mountain
山艾: (ヤマヨモギ) - Artemisia montana; Japanese mugwort
山苞: (やまづと) - souvenir from the mountains
山茱萸: (サンシュユ) - Asiatic dogwood (Cornus officinalis); Japanese cornel; Japanese cornelian-cherry
山茶: (ツバキ) - common camellia/Camellia japonica; (さんちゃ only) tea produced in the mountains
山草: (さんそう) - mountain grass/mountain weed/mountain plant; (やまくさ, やまぐさ only)  Gleichenia japonica (species of fern with white-backed leaves)
山荒: (ヤマアラシ) - porcupine (any mammal of suborder Hystricomorpha)
山荒らし: (ヤマアラシ) - porcupine (any mammal of suborder Hystricomorpha)
山荒亜目: (やまあらしあもく) - Hystricomorpha (suborder of rodents)
山荘: (sansou) - villa na montanha, retiro na montanha, chalé na montanha
山萩: (ヤマハギ) - shrubby lespedeza (species of bush clover, Lespedeza bicolor)
山葡萄: (やまぶどう) - crimson glory vine (species of grapevine, Vitis Coignetiae)
山葵漬: (わさびづけ) - pickled Japanese horseradish; wasabi cut up and mixed with sake lees
山葵漬け: (わさびづけ) - pickled Japanese horseradish; wasabi cut up and mixed with sake lees
山葵醤油: (わさびじょうゆ) - soy sauce flavoured with grated wasabi (used for sashimi, etc.)
山蓬: (ヤマヨモギ) - Artemisia montana; Japanese mugwort
山蕗: (やまぶき) - wild giant butterbur; Japanese silverleaf
山薄荷: (ヤマハッカ) - Plectranthus inflexus (species of plant in the mint family)
山藍: (ヤマアイ) - Mercurialis leiocarpa (species of mercury whose leaves can be used to produce an indigo dye)
山蛭: (ヤマビル) - land leech (Haemadipsa zeylanica japonica)
山蟻: (ヤマアリ) - wood ant (any ant of genus Formica)
山行: (さんこう) - mountain hiking; walking in the mountains
山行者: (さんこうしゃ) - mountain hiker; person engaging in walking activities in the mountains
山袴: (さんぱく) - work hakama that are loose at the top and tight at the bottom
山装う: (やまよそおう) - mountain covered in autumn colours at the end of autumn
山裾: (yamasuso) - pé ou base de uma montanha, planalto
山襞: (やまひだ) - folds of a mountain
山言葉: (やまことば) - mountain language (euphemisms used by hunters, etc. when in the wild)
山詞: (やまことば) - mountain language (euphemisms used by hunters, etc. when in the wild)
山谷風: (やまたにかぜ) - mountain-valley winds; mountain and valley breeze
山越し: (やまごし) - wind blowing down, coming over a mountain; {mahj} immediately after one's draw; {mahj} winning off a discarded tile from the player to one's right or across the table on the turn after letting one's winning tile go by from the player to one's left
山越しをする: (やまごしをする) - to cross a mountain
山躑躅: (ヤマツツジ) - Rhododendron kaempferi (species of rhododendron)
山車: (だんぢり) - (not often used in Kyoto)  decorative portable shrine; float used in festivals
山辣韮: (やまらっきょう) - Japanese onion (edible plant, Allium thunbergii)
山辺: (やまべ) - mountain; vicinity of a mountain
山道: (せんどう) - mountain road; mountain trail
山道に掛かる: (やまみちにかかる) - to come to a mountain path
山鉾: (やまぼこ) - festival float mounted with a decorative halberd
山門: (さんもん) - (originally temples were in the mountains) main temple gate; temple
山開き: (やまびらき) - start of the mountain-climbing season
山陰: (さんいん) - place in the shade of a mountain/shelter of the mountains; (やまかげ only) mountain recess
山陰地方: (さんいんちほう) - San-in region of western Honshu (incl. Tottori, Shimane, northern Yamaguchi and sometimes northern Hyogo and Kyoto prefectures)
山陵: (さんりょう) - mountains and hills; imperial tomb
山陽: (さんよう) - south side of a mountain; Sanyo district
山陽地方: (さんようちほう) - San-you region of western Honshu (incl. Okayama, Hiroshima, southern Yamaguchi and sometimes western Hyogo prefectures)
山際: (やまぎわ) - mountain ridge; near a mountain
山雀: (ヤマガラ) - varied tit (species of titmouse, Poecile varius)
山雪: (やまゆき) - snow that falls on mountains
山霊: (さんれい) - a mountain's guardian deity
山頂を極める: (さんちょうをきわめる) - to reach the summit
山頂光: (さんちょうこう) - alpenglow; alpine glow
